email_content:
Dear Sarah,

Thank you for letting me know what additional materials were needed to complete my application.  Please find the requested information below:

1. Updated Resume
   I have attached (and also pasted below) my most recent resume, reflecting my latest experience, skills and certifications.

2. Professional References
   • Jane Smith – Engineering Manager, Google – jane.smith@google.com  
   • Mike Johnson – Senior Developer, Facebook – mike.johnson@fb.com  
   • Emily Davis – Team Lead, Apple – emily.davis@apple.com

3. Recent Certifications & Awards
   • AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner – issued Mar 2025  
   • Certified Scrum Master (CSM) – issued Jan 2025  
   • 2024 Tech Innovator Award – MIT Alumni Association

— — —
John Doe – Updated Resume

SUMMARY
Software Engineer with 7+ years of experience designing, building and scaling cloud-native applications. Proficient in Java, Python & C++, experienced with AWS/Azure and passionate about agile product delivery.

EXPERIENCE
Software Engineer, Tech Innovations Inc. (2018–2022)  
• Developed and maintained scalable software solutions.  
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software.

EDUCATION
B.S. Computer Science – MIT, 2018

SKILLS
• Java, Python, C++  • AWS, Azure  • Agile / Scrum  • CI/CD  • Microservices

CERTIFICATIONS
• AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner  
• Certified Scrum Master

Please let me know if any additional information is required. I appreciate your time and look forward to the next steps in the process.

Best regards,
John Doe
john.doe@gmail.com
